body.name: M8 Nostalgia Stick Game, Wireless Retro Stick Game Console, Plug & Play Nostalgiastick Wireless Retro Game Console, Nostalgia Stick 4K HDMI Output, Dual 2.4G Wireless Controllers（64G 20000+Game）
features: 【Retro Game Stick Super Classic Games】This is the latest wireless TV game console, which can support 25 languages, and is equipped with a 64G memory card, built-in more than 20,000 games, can search, collect, archive, and support downloading favorite games.

【2 Wireless Controllers】This classic game consoles is equipped with 2 free wireless controllers, enjoy with friends and family! Easy to operate, suitable for sharing your fun with family and friends, providing topics for you and your children to communicate! Feel free to sit back on the comfortable sofa and enjoy your nostalgic stick games.

【Easy to Install】Get started in minutes with simple setup and operation. Simply connect the game stick to power, plug it into your Tv's HDMI Port, and change the TV signal source to the HD channel. It can be connected to TVs, monitors, computers, projectors, etc.

【HD Output, Plug & Play】Supports 4k UHD TV video output (18p / 72p) and monitors and projectors with Hdmi input. Just plug & play, no need to download games or insert cards. You can enjoy vivid and interesting video games on the big screen for a more comfortable gaming experience.

【The best gift of the holiday】With this little game to recover the good memories of childhood, release the pressure of life and work. This is the perfect gift for kids and adults on birthdays or any occasion. A special gift for a recent Christmas. If you are not completely satisfied with your console, please contact us and we will get back to you within 24 hours!
